name: Snowflake
description: Easily execute SQL statement, check the execution's status and cancel the execution on cloud by integrating the Snowflake SQL API.

descriptions.value: Easily execute SQL statement, check the execution's status and cancel the execution on cloud by integrating the Snowflake SQL API.
Integriere die Snowflake SQL API, um SQL-Anweisungen in Snowflake auszuführen, zu überprüfen und zu stoppen.
